name: Java
description: Java was originally developed by James Gosling at Sun Microsystems.

name: Kotlin
description: Kotlin is a statically typed programming language that runs on the Java Virtual Machine (JVM).

name: C
description: C is a procedural programming language originally developed by Dennis Ritchie for use with the Unix operating system.

name: C++
description: C++ is a general-purpose programming language created by Bjarne Stroustrup as an extension of the C language.

name: Python
description: Python is an interpreted, high-level programming language known for its simplicity and readability.

name: JavaScript
description: JavaScript is a high-level, interpreted programming language that is widely used for creating interactive effects within web browsers.

name: Go
description: Go, also known as Golang, is a statically typed, compiled programming language designed by Google.

name: C#
description: C# (pronounced C sharp) is a multi-paradigm programming language developed by Microsoft.

name: PHP
description: PHP is a server-side scripting language designed primarily for web development.

name: Swift
description: Swift is a powerful and intuitive programming language developed by Apple for macOS, iOS, watchOS, tvOS, and beyond.

name: Rust
description: Rust is a systems programming language that focuses on performance, reliability, and memory safety.

name: Scala
description: Scala is a modern multi-paradigm programming language designed to express common programming patterns in a concise, elegant, and type-safe way.
